message.raw:
Fix for RFblaster connection strings. RFBlaster.add_device now checks that the connection names are valid.

Changed order of things in Device.__init__ so that if an error occurs, the device
is not still saved in the compiler inventory.
message.html:
Fix for RFblaster connection strings. RFBlaster.add_device now checks that the connection names are valid.

Changed order of things in Device.init so that if an error occurs, the device
is not still saved in the compiler inventory.
